posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
The answers you gave earlier imply that you want to make this an archer. This race would be an only slightly better archer than a regular Halfling. The only improvements would be that he would be better able to take advantage of a mighty bow and he would have more health. That is not much to gain to compensate for the massive ECL 3 penalty.
On the other hand, this race would excel as a melee warrior, using a scimitar as a two-hander for massive damage, or short sword and shield for still-pretty-good damage and more AC, or even dual-wielding kukris, very deadly.
So, choose your primary weapon(s) (shortbow, scimitar, shortsword, or kukri) and I will make the first 40 levels of a build for each weapon chosen.
Also, I need to know whether or not to include Dev Crit. It is banned? Is it changed, and if so, how?
What about classes? Are there any classes that would be hard or impossible to use, like RDD as a common example of banned or nerfed class?

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
KidMiracleMan wrote:
6) Range preference - DEX archery

 
Does "preference" have any value at all like +AB or just some RP benefit?
8) Maximum item enhancement  +9
That's fine to set the basic weapon/armor modifiers but what is the max or typical mighty property?  STR 20 is enough for a +5 mighty bow and you can still use Bull pots for additional.  An RDD would probably be able to reach near +10 mighty with some pot buffing.

I am inclined towards an ED finesser/bowyer, myself.  With enough fighter levels you could focus/specialize in both bow and melee making pulling apart mobs VERY easy since your ranged attack will be killing many before they get within melee range rather than just attracting them away from the other minions.  And DW, besides with even more fighter plug-ins. That would probably be something like rog/ftr/SD and there are lots of those builds around for you to ruminate over. Unless rog/ftr levels are kept close, though... -20% XP penalty haunts. 

A ftr/Asn/SD would avoid XP pen, yield many Grt DEX bonus with enough Asn but lose out on ED.  You'd be able to DA with ranged or melee attacks, especially with Darkness.

Else, you could potentially go ftr/brd/rdd for the draconic goodies since there will be an XP penalty with rogue as well. Finessing DW would work but ED not possible with that split.
An STR build is easier but tactically limited.  And same deal with the XP penalty.  Only a double prestige will avoid penalty.

Since you haven't mentioned any class, race or feat restrictions/modifications any suggestions the guild makes are being made blind, for whatever help that may prove for you.  There are so many alternatives, it's really difficult to settle on a no-miss combo at this point.
